text:
Hi!  I have a question about accessing a font in a theme.   When I'm in the theme editor, I can assign a font family to a heading, body, or link and once I've done that, the font appears to be available to use for any kind of text in the theme.  For example, if I assign an H6 the font "Herr Von Muellerhoff" I can use that font for a p-tag.  However, if I don't assign that font to any text type, the font doesn't appear to be available for use with the theme.

How can I make the font "Herr Von Muellerhoff" available for use with the theme without having to assign it to a specific text type?

I realize I can go through the fonts.json approach or even the font-face approach, but it appears that HubSpot somehow knows the font and it must be somewhere accessible to the theme since I can assign it within the Theme editor.

Any thoughts?
